fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Trade, Consumers, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Public Health, Food Safety, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: EU Alcohol Strategy, Consumer Information, Circular Economy, Sustainability, Food and Beverage Regulation (specifically consumer information)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Carlsberg Breweries A/S is a member of Brewers of Europe, the World Federation of Advertisers and Danish Industry.
goals__remit:
Carlsberg encourages responsible consumption to prevent misuse of our products.   
 
As part of the many responsible consumption initiatives, Carlsberg is also taking an active part in the European Alcohol and Health Forum alongside other responsible brewers.  
 
Our strategy embraces Western and Eastern European and Asian markets and revolves around our strong portfolio of brands catering to consumers across our markets; our emphasis on being a customer-focused business; our unrelenting focus on efficiency and effectiveness; our commitment to being a socially responsible organisation; and, last but not least, our ability to retain and recruit highly skilled employees.
position: Vice President of Public Affairs and Media Relations
